description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used PowerShell to discover domain accounts by executing Get-ADUser and Get-DGroupMember.(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)(Citation: Secureworks IRON RITUAL Profile)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2022, January 27). Early Bird Catches the Wormhole: Observations from the StellarParticle Campaign. Retrieved February 7, 2022.
Secureworks CTU. (n.d.). IRON RITUAL. Retrieved February 24, 2022.
